text: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, kɨ akam inigha izir gumazir ifavarir pumuning gɨnɨghnɨsi. Kar, Kolaian otarim, Ahap ko, Masean otarim, Sedekaia. Egha kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgei, Aning nan ziam gifara akam akuri. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ aning isɨ Babilonɨn Atrivim Nebukatnesarɨn agharim datɨgham. Eghtɨ a kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, me ian damazibar aning mɨsueghtɨ aning aremegham.
